item.title: This housing-related stock looks ready to take another leg down, says Carter Worth

item.title: Tesla still has 40% more downside even after tumbling 50% since December, says Wells Fargo
item.description: Wells Fargo analyst Colin Langan cut his 12-month price target to $130 from $135 on Friday and reiterated an underweight investment opinion.

item.description: Peloton stock has pulled back more than 32% in the past month.

item.description: The bank upgraded the stock to overweight from equal weight.
